headline: Tesla stock sees 4th week of gains, Chipotle exec. to join board
summary: Electric vehicle manufacturer Tesla (TSLA) is adding Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) President and Chief Strategy Officer Jack Hartung to its board, effective June 1, after Hartung retires from the fast-casual chain. Yahoo Finance senior autos reporter Pras Subramanian expands upon this news as Tesla sees its fourth straight week of stock gains — rising 44% over the past month — alongside waning sales numbers in China. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Nvidia's China R&D center, oil prices climb: Trending Tickers
summary: Market Domination host Josh Lipton and Bullseye American Ingenuity Fund portfolio manager Adam Johnson go over some of the top trending stories of the day. Nvidia (NVDA) is in focus following reports from the Financial Times that the American chipmaker is reportedly building a research and development center in China. Oil prices (CL=F, BZ=F) rise as President Trump says the US is closer to a nuclear deal with Iran. headline: Elon Musk Calls It 'Painful And Difficult'—Why Tesla's Full Self-Driving Buyers May Need A Surprise Hardware Swap
summary: Elon Musk acknowledged in January that Tesla will need to replace Hardware 3 in vehicles owned by customers who purchased the Full Self-Driving package — a driver-assistance system marketed as capable of autonomous driving. He described the situation as both “painful” and “difficult.” What was promised in 2016 is now being revised in 2025 — and not without surprises. headline: Tesla adds Chiptole CEO to board, Vistra & gas, Berkshire's buys
summary: Yahoo Finance host Madison Mills tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Tesla (TSLA) adding Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) CEO Jack Hartung to its board, Vistra (VST) acquiring natural gas assets, and Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) adjusting its positions in Citigroup (C), Constellation Brands (STZ), and Bank of America (BAC). Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Tesla Adds Chipotle Exec Jack Hartung To Board Amid Musk Pay Battle
summary: Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) disclosed on Friday that it had elected John R. (Jack) Hartung to the Board of Directors and the Audit Committee, effective June 1, 2025. Hartung is the president and chief strategy officer of Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE:CMG). He joined the company in 2002 and previously served as its CFO. headline: Nvidia customers will push into AI until they 'become irrelevant'
summary: While the Magnificent Seven tech leaders continue to rally this week, artificial intelligence continues to be a core driver of growth within the tech space. Bokeh Capital Partners Founder and Chief Investment Officer Kimberly Forrest comes on the Morning Brief to talk more about the sustainability of the AI trade — namely in key players like Nvidia (NVDA) — and whether momentum behind trader enthusiasm can hold. headline: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi Says He Isn't Worried About Tesla's Robotaxis – 'Transportation Is A Trillion-Plus-Dollar Industry'
summary: Uber (NYSE:UBER) CEO Dara Khosrowshahi pushed back against the idea of a single dominant player in the transportation sector, saying on April 25 that "there will not be a winner-take-all." At Semafor’s World Economy Summit, Khosrowshahi said the trillion-dollar industry is large enough to support multiple companies, including Tesla (NASDAQ:TSLA). “You could argue that rideshare is going to finally beat personal car ownership in a world where you’ve got robots driving all over the place,” Khosrow
